name: match-comment-phrase-action
description: github action to match a phrase within a github comment and outputs a boolean value when found by a specific mode

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test
scripts.commit: npm run all && git add . && git commit -am 'chore: add dist action'
scripts.commit:push: npm run commit && npm run push
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run push
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run push
